<<<<<<< HEAD
A vvhisper in the eare of Mr. Thomas Edwards minister. By VVilliam VValwyn marchant. Occasioned by his mentioning of him reproachfully, in his late pernitious booke, justly entituled the Gangræna. Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.
1-8, 1, 6-7, 4-5, 2-3, [1] p.
printed according to order, by Thomas Paine, for VVilliam Ley, at Paules-Chaine, London : 1646.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. The page after 8 is numbered "1". Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 13 1645". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
A vvhisper in the eare of Mr. Thomas Edwards minister. By VVilliam VValwyn marchant. Occasioned by his mentioning of him reproachfully, in his late pernitious booke, justly entituled the Gangræna. Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.
1-8, 1, 6-7, 4-5, 2-3, [1] p.
printed according to order, by Thomas Paine, for VVilliam Ley, at Paules-Chaine, London : 1646.
Caption title. Imprint from colophon. The page after 8 is numbered "1". Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 13 1645". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
VVilliam Ley
Thomas Paine
Paules-Chaine
